b2bpl.translation
Class Translator.Context

java.lang.Object
  b2bpl.translation.Translator.Context
All Implemented Interfaces:
TranslationContext
Enclosing class:
Translator
private final class Translator.Context
extends java.lang.Object
implements TranslationContext

Implementation of the TranslationContext interface which handles the translation of different kinds of references.

Author:
Ovidio Mallo

Method Detail

translateSubtyping

private void translateSubtyping(JClassType type)
Generates an axiom for the given type which rules out "wrong supertypes" of that type by contradiction. This makes it possible for the program verifier to not only show whether some type indeed is a supertype of the given type but also whether it is not a supertype.

Parameters:
type - The class type to axiomatize.

translateTypeReference

public BPLExpression translateTypeReference(JType type)
Translates the given type reference. The translation of a new type reference thereby triggers the generation of the following declarations in the BoogiePL program:
  • A name constant representing the given type is declared.
  • If the given type is final, an appropriate axiom expressing this fact is generated.
  • A set of axioms defining the supertype hierarchy of the given type is generated.
  • An axiom expressing the type's object invariant is generated.
The returned BPLExpression is guaranteed to be of type name.

Specified by:
translateTypeReference in interface TranslationContext
Parameters:
type - The type reference to translate.
Returns:
A BPLExpression representing the given type reference.

translateFieldReference

public BPLExpression translateFieldReference(BCField field)
Translates the given field reference. The translation of a new field reference thereby triggers the generation of the following declarations in the BoogiePL program:
  • A name constant representing the given type is declared.
  • An axiom defining the field's declared type is generated.
  • The field's owner type is translated.
The returned BPLExpression is guaranteed to be of type name.

Specified by:
translateFieldReference in interface TranslationContext
Parameters:
field - The field reference to translate.
Returns:
A BPLExpression representing the given field reference.

translateIntLiteral

public BPLExpression translateIntLiteral(int literal)
Translates the given integer literal. If the integer's magnitude is less or equal to the value returned by the Project.getMaxIntConstant() method of the current project, the integer is translated as is to BoogiePL. Otherwise, it is replaced by a special constant representing its value. The returned BPLExpression is guaranteed to be of type int.

Specified by:
translateIntLiteral in interface TranslationContext
Parameters:
literal - The integer literal to translate.
Returns:
A BPLExpression representing the given integer literal.

translateStringLiteral

public BPLExpression translateStringLiteral(java.lang.String literal)
Translates the given string literal. The returned BPLExpression is guaranteed to be of type ref.

Specified by:
translateStringLiteral in interface TranslationContext
Parameters:
literal - The string literal to translate.
Returns:
A BPLExpression representing the given string literal.

translateClassLiteral

public BPLExpression translateClassLiteral(JType literal)
Translates the given class literal. The returned BPLExpression is guaranteed to be of type ref.

Returns:
